entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
